New CheckListView منوی شخصی کاربر View_Associated_Users_MenuItems SELECT Sys_Prs_ShortcutMenu.ShortcutID,Sys_Gui_MenuItems.MenuItemID,Sys_Gui_MenuItems.Label,Sys_Gui_ActivityContexts.Label,Sys_Gui_MenuItems.Description FROM Sys_Gui_MenuItems INNER JOIN Sys_Prs_ShortcutMenu ON Sys_Gui_MenuItems.MenuItemID = Sys_Prs_ShortcutMenu.MenuItemID INNER JOIN Sys_Gui_ActivityContexts ON CAST(SUBSTRING([Action],43,7) AS INT)=Sys_Gui_ActivityContexts.ActivityContextID WHERE (Sys_Gui_MenuItems.Icon='fa-list' OR Sys_Gui_MenuItems.Icon='fa-plus') AND (Sys_Prs_ShortcutMenu.UserID = @ObjectID) SelectQuery

SELECT 'Today' AS BackupStatus, 1 AS Position, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM Net_Clients WHERE (DATEDIFF(DD, LastBackupTime, GETDATE()) = 0) UNION ALL SELECT '1 to 3 Days ago' , 2, COUNT(*) FROM Net_Clients WHERE (DATEDIFF(DD, LastBackupTime, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 1 AND 3) UNION ALL SELECT '4 to 7 Days ago', 3, COUNT(*) FROM Net_Clients WHERE (DATEDIFF(DD, LastBackupTime, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 4 AND 7) UNION ALL SELECT 'More than 1 Week', 4, COUNT(*) FROM Net_Clients WHERE (DATEDIFF(DD, LastBackupTime, GETDATE()) > 7) ORDER BY 2

SELECT Cfg_CIs.CIID AS ID, Org_Regions.Label, Cfg_CIs.Identifier, Cfg_CIs.OrganNumber, Cfg_CIs.OwnerName, Cfg_CIs.SecurityOption00, Cfg_CIs.SecurityOption01, Cfg_CIs.SecurityOption04, Cfg_CIs.SerialNumber, Cfg_CIs.OwnerEmployeeID, Cfg_Vendors.Label AS Cfg_Vendors_Label, Cfg_Products.Label AS Cfg_Products_Label, Cfg_CIStatuses.Label AS Cfg_CIStatuses_Label, Org_Sites.Label, Org_SubRegions.Label, Cfg_CITypes.Label, Org_Buildings.Label, Cfg_CITypes.Category, Org_SubRegions.RegionID, Org_Sites.SubRegionID, Cfg_CIs.CITypeID, Cfg_CIs.LastUpdate FROM Cfg_CIs LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_CITypes ON Cfg_CIs.CITypeID = Cfg_CITypes.CITypeID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_CIStatuses ON Cfg_CIs.CIStatusID = Cfg_CIStatuses.CIStatusID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_Products ON Cfg_CIs.ProductID = Cfg_Products.ProductID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_Vendors ON Cfg_CIs.VendorID = Cfg_Vendors.VendorID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Regions ON Cfg_CIs.RegionID = Org_Regions.RegionID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Sites ON Cfg_CIs.SiteID = Org_Sites.SiteID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_SubRegions ON Cfg_CIs.SubRegionID = Org_SubRegions.SubRegionID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Buildings ON Cfg_CIs.BuildingID = Org_Buildings.BuildingID
SelectQuery 1.2.0.srv

Net_PadvishServers_On_Insert DatabaseTrigger
IF OBJECT_ID (N'[Net_PadvishServers_On_Insert]') IS NOT NULL DROP TRIGGER [Net_PadvishServers_On_Insert] GO CREATE TRIGGER [dbo].[Net_PadvishServers_On_Insert] ON [dbo].[Net_PadvishServers] AFTER Insert AS BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
DECLARE @PadvishServerID AS INT SET @PadvishServerID = (SELECT PadvishServerID FROM inserted)
INSERT INTO [dbo].[Net_Rpt_PadServers] ([PadServerID]) SELECT @PadvishServerID
END

bi.AbrvType DatabaseFunction
IF OBJECT_ID (N'[bi.AbrvType]') IS NOT NULL DROP FUNCTION [bi.AbrvType] GO CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[bi.AbrvType] (@Value NVARCHAR(500)) RETURNS NVARCHAR(500) AS BEGIN IF(@Value IS NULL) RETURN NULL
SET @Value = REPLACE(@Value,N'Padvish',N'') SET @Value = REPLACE(@Value,N'Amnpardaz',N'') SET @Value = REPLACE(@Value,N' For ',N' ') SET @Value = REPLACE(@Value,N'Windows',N'Win') RETURN @Value
END

bi.AbrvOS DatabaseFunction
IF OBJECT_ID (N'[bi.AbrvOS]') IS NOT NULL DROP FUNCTION [bi.AbrvOS] GO CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[bi.AbrvOS] (@Value NVARCHAR(500)) RETURNS NVARCHAR(500) AS BEGIN IF(@Value IS NULL) RETURN NULL
SET @Value = REPLACE(@Value,N'-Service Pack',N' SP') SET @Value = REPLACE(@Value,N' (Core)',N'') SET @Value = REPLACE(@Value,N' (Final)',N'') SET @Value = REPLACE(@Value,N' release',N'') SET @Value = REPLACE(@Value,N' for x64-based Systems',N'') RETURN @Value END
